columns.dc:description:
The type of reply. In detail:
- 4: Multiple choice
- 5: Single answer
- 6: Single-choice SQL query
- 7: Numeric counter
- 8: Datepicker
- 9: Multiple choice SQL query
- 10: Percentage
- 11: Not empty text not containing hashtag
